column1: Local Foods////If you're looking for fast food timing and farm to plate dishes this is the spot. Call ahead for lunch and the order is normally ready w/n ten minutes. I've had the shrimp and crab sandwich
column2: and the famous crunchy chicken sandwich. I'm not a fan of kale but the kale salad is delicious. They have the best home made potato chips. They also offer desert options
column3: and have some vegan choices. Very quaint space if you prefer to dine in. I will definitely be returning.
